MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G62 postcode area of Bardowie. Following a recent power outage, our team have been working to locate and repair an underground cable fault near Boclair View. In order to progress with fault finding, It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:40pm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:20pm on Monday, 02 November 2020
